patthana15.35:1.1: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana15.35:2.1: Āsavañceva sāsavañca akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.35:3.1: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
